recipesJson.name: Spiced Apple Tobacco
recipesJson.author: RinVapes
recipesJson.description: You may have to double these percentages as I mix low. This is good right away. I wanted an apple tobacco but something slightly sweet with some nice notes to it. I used the Cavendish for the sweetness and the Arabian tobacco for the nice spice notes it has. (nutmeg, clove, etc) It's very nice.
